name: DNB MLM Software Development company
tag_list: mlm-software, network-marketing-software, chain-marketing-software, direct-selling-software, binary-software, affiliated-marketing-software
overview:
DNB Consists of many professionals who are qualified to meet any challenges in the Software Industry and also proven the same during the past 7 years facing wide variety of MLM clients across India, USA, Nigeria, Dubai, Malaysia, Thailand and Singapore. We have delivered hundreds of MLM software solutions covering all types of chain marketing business plans in offline or online etc. Besides the above, The DNB’s team is also equipped with the fire-fighting professionals to attend any time for the crisis management services. In the recent times, We have been accepting many take-over MLM projects. The takeover projects are like, a running software having spurious / faulty solutions, hang up situations, interrupted services, inaccurate calculations etc, will approach us for a better Network Marketing software solutions.

MLM Software Solutions and website from DNB Management Applications is well known for technical competency and accuracy in Network Marketing Industry worldwide. We also provide value added direct selling software modules for cheque printing, e-pin generator, payment collection, pay cards to give payouts, smart card for member autorization, mobile money for easy registration and product purchases.
